author: 小浪财讯
title: 传音控股涨2.05%，成交额2.72亿元，主力资金净流入1127.04万元|传音控股_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
7月31日， 传音控股 盘中上涨2.05%，截至11:29，报76.18元/股，成交2.72亿元，换手率0.32%，总市值868.72亿元。
资金流向方面，主力资金净流入1127.04万元，特大单买入1453.82万元，占比5.35%，卖出1412.47万元，占比5.20%；大单买入7810.78万元，占比28.74%，卖出6725.09万元，占比24.75%。
传音控股今年以来股价跌18.52%，近5个交易日涨0.18%，近20日跌0.74%，近60日涨0.26%。
资料显示，深圳传音控股股份有限公司位于广东省深圳市南山区西丽街道西丽社区仙元路8号传音大厦，成立日期2013年8月21日，上市日期2019年9月30日，公司主营业务涉及以手机为核心的智能终端的设计、研发、生产、销售和品牌运营。主营业务收入构成为：手机91.97%，其他6.20%，其他(补充)1.83%。
传音控股所属申万行业为：电子-消费电子-品牌消费电子。所属概念板块包括：MLOps概念、智能手机、操作系统、智能穿戴、智能音箱等。
截至3月31日，传音控股股东户数2.33万，较上期增加4.86%；人均流通股48927股，较上期减少4.63%。2025年1月-3月，传音控股实现营业收入130.04亿元，同比减少25.45%；归母净利润4.90亿元，同比减少69.87%。
分红方面，传音控股A股上市后累计派现123.18亿元。近三年，累计派现97.08亿元。
机构持仓方面，截止2025年3月31日，传音控股十大流通股东中，香港中央结算有限公司位居第四大流通股东，持股2992.48万股，相比上期减少442.55万股。华夏上证科创板50成份ETF（588000）位居第五大流通股东，持股2578.41万股，相比上期减少412.79万股。易方达上证科创板50ETF（588080）位居第六大流通股东，持股1834.97万股，相比上期减少73.96万股。

author: Kasra Moradi
title: Justin Thomas 'luck' stuns Rory McIlroy, Donald Trump's $175M problem - NewsBreak
text: Golf enthusiasts have been on the edge of their seats this week with a series of thrilling events shaking up the sport. The excitement peaked when Rory McIlroy clinched his second victory at The Players Championship , outplaying J.J. Spaun in a nail-biting three-hole playoff that extended the tournament to a fifth day at TPC Sawgrass. The golf world was left stunned by Justin Thomas' incredible stroke of luck during the TGL Finals Series' second semifinal on Tuesday. Thomas led his team, Atlanta Drive Golf Club, to a commanding 9-3 win against Shane Lowry's Bay Golf Club, setting the stage for an epic final against Xander Schauffele's New York squad next week. Thomas' good fortune came into play halfway through the match, as Atlanta held a 4-2 lead. His iron shot on the par-five 10th took a miraculous bounce, steering clear of a hazard and setting him up for a two-putt par that helped him secure a win over Lowry. TGL co-founder McIlroy couldn't hide his astonishment at Thomas' lucky break, exclaiming "no" and adding on commentary: "I don't want to sound biased here but that is just the luckiest bounce I've ever seen." This came after McIlroy's own Boston Common team was eliminated from the playoffs following a 10-6 defeat by New York. Looking ahead, McIlroy is gearing up for his next challenge at the Texas Children's Houston Open. Fresh off his triumph at The Players, he announced his intention to compete once more before making his way to Augusta, aiming to snap his prolonged major title drought. The World No. 2 has now decided to participate in The Houston Open for the first time, which tees off on Thursday, March 27. This gives McIlroy a week's rest before he sets his sights on his first green jacket. In other news, Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund (PIF) is reportedly poised to throw a wrench into discussions aimed at resolving golf's internal conflict. The backers of LIV Golf have been in talks with the rival PGA Tour about a possible merger, having held two meetings at the White House with United States President Donald Trump. However, these promising discussions could be in jeopardy following a report by the Daily Mail this week that the PIF is stepping up its efforts to acquire Wentworth Golf Club in England. Hosting the DP World Tour's flagship BMW PGA Championship each year, a takeover by LIV would likely ruffle feathers among both the formerly named European Tour and their allies, the PGA Tour. According to the report, Wentworth's current owners, Chinese investment firm Reignwood Group, told the Daily Mail that the Surrey-based club they bought for £135 million ($175.5 million) in 2014 is not on the market, and no discussions have taken place with the Saudis. Despite this, the PIF is keen to expand its footprint in British golf, which could put a damper on the initial optimism surrounding Trump's involvement in the merger talks. Adam Scott, a member of the PGA Tour delegation that visited the White House last month, suggests that the ongoing negotiations are being hampered by disagreements over how LIV Golf and the PGA Tour can coexist. The Daily Mail's report also hinted that Saudi Arabia's interest in acquiring Wentworth might be a strategic move to pressure the PGA Tour into an agreement. The PGA Tour received a significant boost from last weekend's viewership numbers. The final round of The Players on NBC significantly outperformed the final round of LIV Golf's Singapore event on FS1, with a ratio of 100-1. McIlroy's victory over Spaun attracted an average of 3.6 million viewers on NBC, marking a roughly 3 percent increase from Scottie Scheffler's win the previous year. In contrast, LIV Golf's event, which ran from Saturday night into the early hours of Sunday, saw Joaquin Niemann's win draw a modest average of 34,000 viewers, following the Saudi-backed golf tour's new media rights deal with FOX Sports. Meanwhile, PGA Tour members are currently voting until April 14 to elect two co-chairs for the Player Advisory Council. Rickie Fowler, Maverick McNealy, and Keith Mitchell were announced as candidates on Tuesday, chosen by the player directors. The top two vote-getters will replace current player directors Peter Malnati and Webb Simpson starting January 1, 2026.

author: fotmob (no-reply@fotmob.com)
title: Bobby De Cordova-Reid stunner sees Fulham beat Rotherham in FA Cup
text:
Bobby De Cordova-Reid stunner sees Fulham beat Rotherham in FA Cup
The Jamaica international capitalised on a mistake and scored his second in as many games.
A Bobby De Cordova-Reid stunner saw Fulham beat Rotherham 1-0 in the third round of the FA Cup at Craven Cottage.
The Jamaica international capitalised on a mistake and scored his second in as many games after Sunday’s winner during Fulham’s 2-1 victory over Arsenal in the Premier League.
Victory for Marco Silva’s men has kept them in both cup competitions ahead of Fulham’s Carabao Cup semi-final clash against Liverpool later this month.
A cagey first few minutes in west London saw Andreas Pereira showcase his quick feet before his driven shot cannoned off a defender. Fulham appealed for a handball but referee Simon Hooper waved them away and a corner was given.
Rotherham had little to show for their efforts, and their low defensive line invited pressure in the 20th minute.
Fulham’s De Cordova-Reid threatened with a cross and the Cottagers’ Championship opponents were fortunate to not go a goal down from the following corner when Rodrigo Muniz’s effort was blocked.
De Cordova-Reid opened the scoring in spectacular fashion after 24 minutes.
Rotherham’s attempt to play the ball out from the back ran into trouble when Harry Wilson’s press forced a turnover and De Cordova-Reid’s long-range effort flew past Viktor Johansson into the top left corner.
A lethargic Rotherham rarely ventured into Fulham’s territory but Jordan Hugill’s offside goal from a Tom Eaves cross added to their frustrations.
Fulham nearly doubled their lead in the 42nd minute but Pereira was denied by a post.
Right-back Kenny Tete marauded forward and delivered a dangerous cross to the unmarked Pereira, who struck the ball into the ground before it cannoned off a post and into the path of Harrison Reed, whose close-range shot was deflected behind for a corner.
Fulham continued to be lively after the break. The dangerous Tete surged forward and his drilled cross caused Rotherham keeper Johansson to fumble the ball. The Swedish international’s blushes were saved when he made a stop from six yards out.
The hosts slowed the game down and dominated the ball but the game burst into life through Issa Diop after 76 minutes.
The centre-back picked up the ball and cut through Rotherham’s midfield before a neat combination with Timothy Castagne saw the towering defender’s first-time strike narrowly miss the target.
Fulham countered from a corner during five added minutes but Carlos Vinicius’ shot was saved after Willian squared it to him.

author: VNExplorer
title: Bhagavad Gita's Divine Wisdom: Sin vs. Blessings in Verse 3 of Chapter 3
text: Hare Krishna, We will proceed on our journey with the 13th verse of the third chapter from Bhagavad Gita. As it is, the Sanskrit verse is as follows. Yagyashista shinhasanto munchante sarvakil bishaye bhunjate TE toa gham Papa. The English translation is as follows. The devotees of the Lord are released from all kinds of sins because they eat food which is offered first for sacrifice. Others who prepare food for personal sense enjoyment verily eat only sin. If you observe the verse, it says Yadge shishta which means remnants and ashina means to eat or accept. Santo means devotees and munchate Sarabhakil Bisha in which munchate means liberated and kilbishe means all the contaminations. So by taking remnants of yagya, saintly persons become free from all sinful reactions. Munjete tohum Papa in which Agham means the sin. So who are the sinners? The sinners are yeh pachante aat makaranat, those who cook for aat makaranat for their own purpose. So those who try to eat food for their own purpose, they consume sin only. The point is that in all the cultures there has traditionally been some form of acknowledgement that we should offer prayers to the higher being. For example, Christians may offer grace by folding their hands and praying, thanking God for providing food. Similarly, in different religions, there are various traditions that we recognize the food we receive as a provision from higher beings, not solely the result of our own efforts. While our efforts are important, they are not all important. When we offer food to Krishna, we acknowledge that we lack the capacity to produce food on our own. By recognizing that Krishna has provided the food, we express our gratitude. By offering food to Krishna, then accepting it, we acknowledge His mercy. Through this acknowledgement and the devotional connection it establishes, Krishna frees us from the sinful reactions. Yagya shishta shina Santa. Now someone may say that we are vegetarian and it is enough. Vegetarianism is important, but it is not all important. Vegetarianism alone will not free us from all sinful reactions, nor does it purify us completely. It does minimize the sinful reactions we incur and reduces the significant amount of violence that is occurring today. However, the important point is that even if the food is vegetarian, one is still eating sin if it is not offered to Krishna. Bhunjate TE togham Tata. So therefore, as a devotee, it is crucial for us to offer the food to Krishna and then accepting it as a reciprocation, as a mercy from Krishna. Thank you. We will discuss the 14th verse in the next episode. Hare Krishna.

author: The Peninsula Newspaper
title: FPEA Toastmasters Club visits the Philippines Migrant Workers Office | The Peninsula Qatar
text:
On the morning of 25th December 2023, the Toastmasters club of the Filipino Planning Engineers Association (FPEA) celebrated the spirit of the holidays by sharing goods with the Philippine Migrants Workers Office represented by Ester Salubre (Duty Officer) and Sonnette Alvarez (House Parent).
The club Executive Committee are Elmay G. Sebua (President), Angelo D. Mora (Vice President for Education), Ivy B. Aguba (Vice President for Membership), Guillermo C. Sabadisto Jr. (Vice President for Membership), Kei Francis A. Vallejera (Treasurer), Pinky Rose Gregana (Secretary), Shane E. Belen (Sargeant at Arms), and Maria Fatima F. Rafael (Immediate Past President).
The club members are Danilo L. Chan, Eubeth P. Estanol, Felipe D. Catinoy, Florante V. Ileto, Gregorio M. Belleta, Imelda Silot, Marlon M. De La Fuente, Ramongil Nino N. Baquilta, Ritchelle Joy S. Lutrago, Roy H. Mausig, Vannielyn E. Belen, and Wendell C. Gacula. The club is under Area 6 of Division B of District 116 of Region 11 of Toastmaster International.

author: Contexto
title: La terrible predicción de Mhoni Vidente sobre la salud del Papa | Contexto Tucuman
text:
Domingo 23 de Febrero de 2025, 09:51
Mhoni Vidente, la reconocida astróloga, sorprendió a sus seguidores con una nueva predicción sobre el futuro del Papa Francisco. A pesar de los reportes que indican una mejoría en su estado de salud, la vidente aseguró que se avecinan cambios importantes en el Vaticano.
Durante una de sus recientes lecturas astrológicas, Mhoni Vidente analizó la situación del Papa Francisco y sostuvo que su salud sigue en un estado delicado. Según la astróloga, el Sumo Pontífice enfrenta una crisis médica que podría definir su futuro al frente de la Iglesia.
“El Papa Francisco nació el 17 de diciembre, un número que representa ciclos de cierre y nuevos comienzos. Eso me indica que su etapa en el Vaticano está llegando a su fin”, explicó Mhoni.
Además, la vidente aseguró que el líder de la Iglesia Católica no solo atraviesa dificultades físicas, sino que también enfrenta desafíos internos dentro del Vaticano. “No solo es un problema de salud, también hay presiones externas y conflictos que lo estarían llevando a tomar decisiones drásticas”, agregó.
Mhoni Vidente fue contundente al mencionar la posibilidad de una renuncia. En su visión, el Papa Francisco podría dejar su cargo antes de lo previsto debido a complicaciones médicas y presiones dentro del Vaticano.
“La gente no lo quiere aceptar, pero lo veo cada vez más debilitado. Sus pulmones no están funcionando como antes, el COVID-19 le dejó secuelas importantes y eso está afectando su capacidad para hablar y respirar con normalidad. Quedará postrado en la cama”, detalló la astróloga. Además, advirtió que su salida abriría un nuevo capítulo en la historia de la Iglesia. “Veo un Papa nuevo en camino, alguien que traerá cambios significativos y una nueva era para la religión”, afirmó. /Aire de Santa Fe
Predicciones del mes de Diciembre 2024 El Padre Francisco I grave de Salud por cuestión de Pulmones y Neumonia se reporta estando Crítico
— Mhoni Vidente (@mhonividente)[#22deFebrero2025][#Mhonividente][#papa][#sanfrancisco][#Vaticano][#Roma][pic.twitter.com/IQW5JwOgnp][February 22, 2025]

author: hotukdeals.com
title: [Steam/PC] Tales Of Vesperia Definitive Edition | hotukdeals
text: Vesperia returns! It's time to celebrate the 10th anniversary of Tales of Vesperia with an improved version of the popular Anime RPG with the Tales of Vesperia\u00a0 Definitive Edition! Players will witness the power struggle between the citizens of Terca Lumireis, who are dependent on an ancient technology - the blastia - and the Empire that controls it. Join the fight and follow the story of two friends whose paths intertwine in an epic adventure that threatens the existence of all. UNIQUE BATTLE SYSTEM Engage in exciting close-quarter combat using the series' trademarked Evolved Flex-Range Linear Motion Battle System. Gain an advantage in battle by using the right attack and approaching enemies while they're unaware of your presence - and chain together combo attacks with the aim of activating your character's Fatal Strike move. DEFINITIVE EXPERIENCE Witness updated, upscaled full HD graphics, brand-new music tracks, exciting mini-games, boss fights, and a collection of unreleased costume DLC - Tales of Vesperia has never looked so good! NEW CHARACTERS The roster has expanded with the Definitive Edition as players can now control two additional playable characters. Play as Patty Fleur - a tough young pirate girl in search of treasure, adventure and her forgotten memories - and Flynn Scifo, an Imperial Knight and Yuri\u2019s best friend.
